base.name: SerenityForgeJAM
base.desc: A choose your adventure text game, testing around with Twinery2
base.work: Tweaked around with the Twinery engine so one can both edit the story and the flow.

base.name: QuackHack 2016
base.desc: A top-down scalable tower defense game.
base.work: Game Manager, Eyes Controller, Missile Animation, Logic Implementation, Merger

base.name: LudumDare34
base.desc: Asymmetric VR game: One Vive player vs 2 Xbox controller players. A Gardener wants the world to be filled with flower while the Angry LumberJacks want to rid the world of flower.
base.work: LumberJacks Controller and Events, Game Manager, Events and End-game condition

base.name: PlayFab Jam
base.desc: A game focused on drug effect
base.work: Implement basic controller and background effect

base.name: 8-bit History Jam
base.desc: A game where you are thrown into a virtual social network where your opinion will be manipulated. Explore the fake internet, choose your path, and ask yourself, 'What am I thinking?'

base.name: Global Game Jam 2015
base.desc: A choose your adventure game that revolves around the dead loop paradox

base.name: HogJam #5
base.desc: An Oculus Rift game where you travel down an exploding mine! Formed a team with two B.A.T veterans, one of which (Chris) brough his super cool Rift kit!
base.work: Control interactive functionality, environment elements and music integration

base.name: HogJam #4
base.desc: A cart game where you control a time travelling train, inspired by a horror writing site!

base.name: HogJam #3
base.desc: A Sim Game with Plant vs Zombie Mechanic. Gain money, make buildings.
base.work: The game turned out to be pretty cool, but none of the teammates decided to upload it...

base.name: Global Game Jam 2014
base.desc: A Visual Novel where you are trapped with a girl, and lots of question about life haunt ya both.

base.name: HogJam #2
base.desc: A chicken Shooter Game, with the funniest chicken art ever seen! I arrived late, but lucky enough, Mike from BAT let me join the team and have fun! It was a great team! Everyone pulled out a really cool game that's surprisingly fun to watch!

base.name: HogJam #1
base.desc: A Fun Climbing game Made with a whooping big team! (Left-over devs who were looking for collabrators). Eventually they all grouped up into a small studio!
base.work: Frustrated and Embarrassed a little because I did not have enough experience at the time. But overall, it was fun and great. The product turn out to be superb, thanks to all of the wonderful teammates!
